text: Stormy Daniels has a message for the mom of the other famous Storm ( i ) y. The porn star who allegedly slept with the president says Kylie ’ s baby ’ s only going to be ‘ trouble ’! It ’ s probably a total coincidence that Kylie Jenner named her newborn daughter Stormi Webster at the same time that another Stormy became a household name, right? Stormy Daniels, the former porn star and alleged mistress to now - president Donald Trump thinks that, too — but it didn ’ t stop her from sending a message to Kylie through TMZ ( watch HERE ). “ I will say congratulations ( to Kylie ), and I wish her all the best, ” she said. “ And hang on to your heart, because little girls named Stormi are known to cause trouble. ”
